lessons.title: 1. IoT Security Fundamentals
lessons.description: Learn about IoT security challenges and protection strategies

pages.title: IoT Security Overview
pages.content: IoT security involves protecting Internet of Things devices and networks from cyber threats. It's challenging due to the diversity of devices, limited resources, and lack of security standards.

pages.title: IoT Security Challenges
pages.content: Common IoT security challenges include weak authentication, insecure communications, lack of updates, default passwords, and limited processing power for security measures.

pages.title: Quiz: IoT Security
pages.question: What is the biggest challenge in IoT security?

options.text: Diversity of devices and lack of standards

pages.explanation: The diversity of IoT devices and lack of unified security standards make IoT security particularly challenging, as each device may have different security requirements and capabilities.
